snippet.title: Starlight ReVolver - Official Reveal Trailer (ft. Sarah Bonito)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://steam.starlightrevolver.com/game

All footage captured in-engine from our pre-alpha build.

Dive into vibrant dream worlds, where every adventure brings you closer to Nishi stardom! Team up to unleash explosive combos and defeat powerful foes. Then, unwind in the lively city of NIM, where you can hang-out, craft and relax with friends.

Song: 星になって "Hoshi Ni Natte" 
Written by Miyolophone and Sarah Bonito
Produced by Miyolophone
Vocals by Sarah Bonito
Mixed by PliXoR

Animation by Studio Yotta
Edited by Jason Diaz

Tags: Starlight Re:Volver, Starlight ReVolver, Pahdo Labs, PahdoLabs, Pahdo
